}}'''1.7.10 Build 10<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://mcedudev.tumblr.com/post/100744852684/new-development-build-to-fix-mod-issues|title=New Development Build! |date=October 23, 2014 |website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref>''' is the tenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on October 23, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==

=== General ===
* Delete button to World Library in Server Launcher

== Fixes ==
'''7 bugs fixed'''
* World Library in Server Launcher not working in build 9 because of the language reformat.
* Some mods like Custom NPCs, HQM and Galacticraft not working properly.
* Students seeing teachers who are in spectate mode.
* Some animals like squids "flickering" if server was started with animals disabled.
* Ban command not working.
* [[:Category:MinecraftEdu stable builds released in 2014|1.7.10 stable builds]] not bolded in Launcher's update list.
* Single player crashing the client.
